name: Enock

projects.title: ZED Payments
projects.description: ZED allows a business to accept different payment methods including mobile money, cash, card and crypto with ease.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: We help with the creation and development of online advertising ideas, with particular focus on their visual appearance.

services.title: Mobile Development
services.description: We design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors.

aboutpara: As a skilled Javascript developer, I specialize in developing user-friendly and performant web applications that meet the needs of businesses and their customers. With over 3 years of experience working with Javascript and related technologies, I have a proven track record of delivering high-quality software solutions that drive results.
